channel.title: Data Science Portfolio on Prakarsh Ravi
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Portfolio on Prakarsh Ravi

item.title: Project 2: Credit Scorecard
item.description: Scorecard based credit lending model, based on Lending Club loans data from 2007 to Q2 2020. Lake View Alfred Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Project 1: Ireland Weather and Power Consumption
item.description: To create this project, data from the following sources was utilized - Weather data from Met Eireann: Meteorological data published by Met Eireann for weather stations across the country was retreived and then processed to match data available for electricity load. Electricity Load data as provided by ENTSO-E Data Exchange. Data was made available for most EU countries, starting Jan 1 2015, and Ireland data was retrieved and processed to create the model.
